Description_lang: Play this instrument of Bastion, improving the performance and morale of nearby friendly players while outdoors in the Shadowlands.
AuraDescription_lang: You are inspired by the music of Bastion, $?E0[increasing your Armor, ][]$?E1[healing you periodically, ][]$?E2[increasing your speed while mounted, ][]$?E3[increasing your speed while running, ][]$?E4[increasing your $pri, ][]and improving your mood.
